stripped_text: If Herald is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Herald, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Herald from Archives. Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine The Corp may pay up to 2 credits to place that number of advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
text:
If Herald is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Herald, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Herald from Archives.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Corp may pay up to 2[credit] to place that number of advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
title: Herald
